General.Name: Gaya Abadi Sempurna
General.Description: PT Gaya Abadi Sempurna Tbk develops and trades in electric vehicles and electronic components in Indonesia. It offers electric mopeds, motors, bikes, SPV, and PMD vehicles; and fans and LED light products. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Gaya Abadi Sempurna Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Selis Investama Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Serang Km 29, Tangerang, Indonesia
